statements: UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890', interests = 'reading, hiking', gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 102

UPDATE preferences_table SET preference_description = 'Updated preference description' WHERE preference_id = 2;
UPDATE customers_table SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_age=30 WHERE customer_id=1;
